oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tonight We Salute… Florence, Alabama - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part of WSM's Tonight We Salute series, this episode salutes Florence, Alabama (part 2). Personnel include Grant Turner (host), Beasley Smith (WSM Orchestra conductor), WSM Orchestra (performer), Dutch Gordon (WSM Orchestra trombonist), Buddy Hall (performer), Dottie Dillard (performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), Mayor E. F. Martin (guest speaker, Mayor of Florence, Al.), W. H. Mitchell (guest speaker, President of the Florence Chamber of Commerce), Herman K. Longshore (guest speaker, Probate Judge), and Louis A. Eckle (Editor of the Florence Times). Part 1:
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Hall; Dottie Dillard; WSM Orchestra; Rod Brasfield
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Dottie Dillard -- Hot Dog! That Made Him Mad (Dottie Dillard) -- Grant Turner introduces Herman K. Longshore -- Herman K. Longshore talks -- Ballin' The Jack (WSM Orchestra) -- Grant Turner introduces Louis A. Eckle -- Louis A. Eckle talks -- Stella By Starlight (Buddy Hall) -- Grant Turner introduces Mayor E. F. Martin -- Mayor E. F. Martin talks -- Grant Turner thanks the guests -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield) -- Theme (WSM Orchestra) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smith, Beasley; WSM Orchestra; Hall, Buddy (Singer); Dillard, Dottie; Brasfield, Rod; Gordon, Dutch
